formalpara.title: Figure 4. Intracellular accumulation of mutant type IV collagen
formalpara.para: In a collagen IV α1 chain missense mutant, emb-9(g23), the LET-2 α2 chain accumulates within body wall muscle cells and is not secreted. EMB-9 also fails to be secreted. In these mutants muscle cells detach from the body wall, resulting in gaps in the body wall muscle quadrants.
